concept.name: Spirit of the Frontier
concept.concept: Found the mythic rifle that belonged to Wynona Earp
concept.tenet: Who does this power want me to findâ€¦ and maybe kill?

concept.name: Former Mob Hitwoman
concept.concept: Got out of the game by eliminating her former 'co-workers'
concept.tenet: Never let anyone get too close

anchorMove.name: Winchester Model 1876 Lever Action Rifle
anchorMove.description: You have a mythic weapon that does 3 harm, functions at all ranges, is mystically concealable, and cannot be taken from you by normal means. When using it, use the better of (+Mythos) or (+Attribute+1). Take one drawback tag for the weapon: loud, messy, reload, or unreliable

flaw.name: A-whoopin' and a-hollerin'
flaw.description: You are Impulsive and reckless, and find it hard to do methodical tasks while wielding your weapon. You may take -1 ongoing on long-form tasks to mark Attention to your Mythos.

additionalMoves.name: Enchanted Ammo
additionalMoves.description: Your Mythic Weapon can be loaded with multiple different ammo types to account for different circumstances. Adds the reload tag to the weapon. To Reload, roll +Mythos

outcomes.10+: You have plenty of ammo of exactly the kind you need for the situation
outcomes.7-9: You have the ammo, but the MC will choose a drawback or flaw
outcomes.6-: You have Just One Bullet of the type you need and it is deeply flawed. The MC will tell you how

hold: Buckshot - hits more than one target
Ghost Shot - can hurt incorporeal entities
Trick Shot - can ricochet off hard surfaces to shoot around corners

flaw.name: Ammo Grab Bag
flaw.description: You can tell the MC that you are randomly drawing ammo to mark Attention on your Mythos. The MC will choose what he thinks is the most interesting...

additionalMoves.name: Alive to my Surroundings
additionalMoves.description: Whenever you Read a Bad Situation, you always take 1 additional hold, even on a 6-. Additionally, you can always spend your hold from Read a Bad Situation to Ask Any Question.

flaw.name: Sensory Overload
flaw.description: Whenever you are in a highly stimulating situation, you may take 1 Stress to mark Attention to your Mythos

anchorMove.name: Infiltrator
anchorMove.description: When you attempt to infiltrate a secure area alone, roll +Logos. As the MC describes the infiltration and the security measures you must overcome, you may spend 1 hold to describe how you overcome the obstacle
hold: bypass a security system or guard
disable a security system you have bypassed
give an advantage (+1 forward) to a member of your crew

flaw.name: Under Cover of Darkness
flaw.description: If you have to Infiltrate in a way that leaves you feeling literally or metaphorically exposed, you may take 1 Stress to mark Attention on your Logos

additionalMoves.name: Super Spy
additionalMoves.description: During your infiltration, you will have opportunity to observe information that will be useful later. After you have spent all your Infiltrator hold you may sort through what you have taken to get 2 hold as though you had rolled 10+ on Investigate a Mystery.

flaw.name: I Know Too Much
flaw.description: Describe how something you learned spying reminds you of your criminal past, and take 1 Stress to mark Attention to your Logos.

additionalMoves.name: Assassin
hold: Inflict Stress on all enemies in the scene equal to the Harm inflicted by the attack
Ask a question as per Read a Bad Situation
Create Juice as per Change the Game

flaw.name: I've Made Some Enemies
flaw.description: On any interaction with the criminal underworld, you may describe the bad blood between you and the criminal. Take -1 ongoing for any interactions in this scene to mark Attention on your Logos.

equipment.name: Winchester Model 1876
equipment.tags: intimate, close, far, melee, concealable, loud, reload

contacts.name: El Raton
contacts.description: Stool Pigeon, Former capo, now in witsec
